update_plan.update_summary: The major update requires documenting the addition of metadata to the training summary file, improving its granularity and utility for analysis and debugging purposes. Additionally, updates are needed in documentation related to AI Integration Module.
key_changes: Addition of metadata to the training summary file
Update in documentation for AI Integration Module

specific_updates.README.md: Update section on the AI Integration Module, detailing the addition of metadata to the training summary file.
specific_updates.master_blueprint.md: Update the AI Integration Module's section in the master blueprint, highlighting the improvements brought by adding metadata to the training summary file.
specific_updates.current_status.json: Include a note about the recent change and its potential impact on system efficiency and transparency.
